text: Skid Proof is a 1923 silent film drama directed by Scott R. Dunlap and starring Buck Jones, billed as Charles Jones. It was produced and released by Fox Film Corporation. Skid Proof at silentera.comThe AFI Catalog of Feature Films:Skid Proof It is a surviving film in the Museum of Modern Art collection. title: Skid Proof
